meta.description: Optimize the production of milk and dark chocolate bars to minimize total production time given resource constraints.

sets.name: CHOCOLATE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of chocolate bars produced in the shop.

params.name: cocoa_requirement
params.description: Cocoa units required per chocolate bar type.

params.name: milk_requirement
params.description: Milk units required per chocolate bar type.

params.name: production_time
params.description: Production time in minutes per chocolate bar type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of chocolate bars to produce for each type.

objective.name: min_total_production_time
objective.description: Minimize the total production time for all chocolate bars.

constraints.name: production_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: At least twice as many milk chocolate bars as dark chocolate bars.
